body: My comment about thread safety still applies. I wasn't concerned about the safety of `thrust::pair` (I just this it's simpler to use `std::pair`), it's `gen_->philox_seed_offset++` that's unsafe. I'm not exactly sure how much do we care about this, since our CPU PRNGs aren't thread safe either. Any opinions @colesbury?
